name: BTCA1
description: BTCA1 is a next-generation decentralized BEP20 token on Binance Smart Chain, designed with Bitcoin-level security and a fixed total supply.
extended_description: Key Features: Decentralized governance, Fixed total supply: 225,000,000 BTCA1, Secure and immutable smart contract, Fair trading tax (5% buy, 4.21% sell), Active community support. Stay connected via our official channels: Telegram: https://t.me/btc_a1_official, GitHub: https://github.com/khatuSP/btc-a1-website
